quest.name: Newfound Journey
journal:
The wandering minstrel has a request for an experienced adventurer.

※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Making your way through the Ruby Road Exchange during the Rising, you encounter the wandering minstrel, who asks you to take a fledgling adventurer under your wing. Thus do you make your way to the Gate of Nald, there to await a soul who has just embarked upon the path of adventure.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

It doesn't take long for an aspiring adventurer to wander through the gate, nor for you to identify him. You approach the bright-eyed lad, who introduces himself as Nhagi'a Jakkya. He gratefully accepts your offer of help, and heads to the Quicksand to register with the Adventurers' Guild, as you yourself once did.

With the stroke of a pen and a few words of encouragement from Momodi, Nhagi'a's registration is complete. In view of your experience, the Quicksand proprietress then tasks you with giving the lad the grand tour, beginning with recommending a guild in Ul'dah to join.

Your sage advice helps Nhagi'a to settle on a guild. Wasting no time, he rushes off to add his name to its roll, but not before requesting to meet again afterwards. When the lad doesn't return after a good while, you decide to look in on him at the guild.

To your relief, you find Nhagi'a more than holding his own. After apologizing for keeping you waiting, he informs you that a peculiar minstrel had approached him with a task, and bade him come to the Ruby Road Exchange to speak further. Curiously, your own presence is also requested, and you make your way to see the client together.

As you had suspected, the client turns out to be the wandering minstrel. The man reveals that, in seeking inspiration for his next composition, he contrived to bring you and Nhagi'a together─an adventurer old and an adventurer new─in a reminder that the present owes its existence to the past. Having thus established his vision, the minstrel then asks each of you to bring him an object with a connection to the Calamity, the event which gave rise to the realm's rebirth. Excited for his first-ever task as an adventurer, Nhagi'a suggests taking your search to the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, where many vendors peddle their wares.

You join Nhagi'a at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, and together begin looking for your objects.

※You must be accompanied by Nhagi'a Jakkya to complete this task. Speak with him again should you become separated.

You have visited a number of vendors and found promising wares for your purposes. Believing you've seen enough, Nhagi'a suggests heading to a quiet spot to discuss what you will bring to the minstrel.
You reveal your selection to Nhagi'a, but he chooses to keep his a surprise. Having then acquired your respective items, you head back to the Ruby Road Exchange, where the wandering minstrel awaits.

You present your acquisition to the minstrel, who declares its suitability for his composition before turning his attention to Nhagi'a. The lad reveals his object to be the scrapbook of articles taken from The Raven, the Gridanian tabloid where his sister works as a reporter. During the Calamity, said sister traveled the realm, interviewing adventurers about their journeys, and her tales instilled in him the desire to see the world. Your combined contributions serve to inspire the minstrel, who conceives of a verse and proceeds to perform it. No sooner does he strum the first chord than you are transported to a place beyond time and space, where you meet with the mysterious Naoki Yoshida. The man thanks you for continuing to grace the realm with your presence, and hints that change is coming. Yet come what may, he hopes that your journey together shall ever continue.

Returning to reality, you bid Nhagi'a well as he sets off on his own. And after the young adventurer has disappeared from sight, the minstrel performs for you another song─one of futures unknown and journeys unending. Hardships may await upon the road ahead, and there may be times when you feel defeated. But so long as you harbor love for this world, ever shall there be a place for you in it.
objectives: Check on Nhagi'a Jakkya at his chosen guild.
Speak with the wandering minstrel at the Ruby Road Exchange.
Speak with Nhagi'a Jakkya and have him accompany you.
Look around the Sapphire Avenue Exchange while accompanied by Nhagi'a Jakkya.
Accompany Nhagi'a Jakkya to the designated location and then speak with him.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Greetings, friend. By your dauntless bearing, I assume you are an adventurer.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: As for myself, I am a humble wandering minstrel. One who draws inspiration from the daring deeds of those in your calling.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Ah, if it isn't my dear adventurer friend! Pleased am I to see you again. Have you perchance come to join us in remembering the Calamity?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: If you have a moment, there is a favor I would ask of you. Will you not hear me out?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Of late, more people are seeking to take up adventuring.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: In part due to the promotional efforts during the recent Moonfire Faire, more people are seeking to take up adventuring.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Not all are yet wise in the ways of the world, however, and I fear they might fall prey to less-principled types in Ul'dah.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: If one such as you were to help them on their way, I would feel more at ease. What say you? Will you not take a fledgling adventurer under your wing?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: I'm truly grateful!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Now, I believe a carriage is due to arrive shortly. If you go and wait at the Gate of Nald, chances are a soul will wander in who has just embarked upon the path of adventure. Pray greet them and offer your help.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Worry not, you'll have no trouble identifying them. You need but look for someone absorbed in their surroundings.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Hehe, I daresay it will feel like glimpsing into the past─right to the part where you are greeted by a helpful stranger.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Oi, adventurer! Over here!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Is this your first trip to Ul'dah?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Welcome to Ul'dah!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Bright-eyed Youth-)Wh-Who are you?

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Bright-eyed Youth-)An experienced adventurer, you say? And you want to help me on my way?

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: (-Bright-eyed Youth-)Well, I could certainly use some guidance. I've never been anywhere near as big and busy as Ul'dah...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: My name is Nhagi'a Jakkya, but just “Nhagi” will do. And as you rightly guessed, I'm an aspiring adventurer. That's why I left my village and came here.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: So...I understand that you first need to register at the Adventurers' Guild. Do you know where it is?

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Just through that door, is it? Thank you, I'll head there at once!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Nhagi rushes off before you can offer further explanation. Perhaps you should follow him to the Quicksand.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: In...and out... In...and out... Come on, Nhagi, you can do it...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Oh, it's you again... To be honest, I'm quite nervous. It's heartening to have you here too.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Why, hello there. What can I do for you today?

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: The lad's here to register, is he?

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Yes, madam, I wish to join the Adventurers' Guild! My name is Nhagi'a Jakkya, and I'm sixteen years old─practically a man grown!

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Hehe, aren't we a lively one? Momodi's the name, and if you want to be an adventurer, then you've come to the right woman.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: There's nothing to it, really─you just need to write your name in the register. Come, come...

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: With that, you're officially a member of the Adventurers' Guild. If you ever need a bit of advice about one thing or another, pay me a visit. Just don't go botherin' me every time you stub your bloody toe, all right?

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: 'Course, I do enjoy hearin' tell of a gentleman's woes with the womenfolk from time to time...

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Now then, normally I'd offer you the grand tour...

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: But in light of present company, I reckon you ought to have it from herhim.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: SheHe's your senior in adventurin', after all, and you could do worse than to get herhis advice.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: SheHe's a renowned adventurer, after all─the bleedin' champion of Eorzea─and you could do far worse than to get herhis advice.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: To begin with, mayhap you could recommend a guild here in Ul'dah for Nhagi to join?

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: If it's too noisy in here, there are benches just outside where you can have a nice little chat.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: With your experience, I reckon you could give Nhagi some sound advice on a guild to join. Go on, have a little chat and see what might suit him.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I must confess, choosing a guild is quite daunting... I'd appreciate any advice you can offer.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The following event cannot be skipped. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: All right, let's talk guilds.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Give me just a moment.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I'm all ears, Forename!

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Adventuring can be dangerous. What attracted you to it?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Why did you want to become an adventurer?

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: A merchant who was in the carriage with me─a Bre...something─asked me much the same thing.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: At the time, I couldn't give a proper answer. I had a reason for leaving home, of course, but I couldn't express it in words.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: But having now set foot in Ul'dah, it's become clear in my mind.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I wanted to know what lay beyond the horizon. Wanted to see it with my own eyes and be amidst it.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: You've been to many places, right? You like it, then? Traveling, that is...

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: I love traveling. There's nothing like the thrill of seeing new sights.

dialogue.name: A4
dialogue.text: Traveling is nice, but I'd prefer to put my roots down somewhere.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: So you do, so you do...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I have an older sister. During the Calamity, we fled Gridania and took refuge in a village in the mountains.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I ended up staying in that secluded place, and it's long been a dream of mine to travel the world.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Truly? That's a little unexpected...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: And yet...perhaps it's when we've seen the world that we know there's a perfect place for us. One we'd like to call home.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: But inexperienced as I am, I don't know if I could live a life on the road. Is there a guild that could equip me with the skills I need?

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: What guild will you recommend?

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: One representing students of the fighting arts.

dialogue.name: A6
dialogue.text: One representing crafters and gatherers.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I see, a place where I can learn how to protect myself and others... If I recall correctly, Ul'dah is home to the Pugilists' and Thaumaturges' Guilds.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Of those two, I'd choose the pugilists. I've always enjoyed rigorous exercise, and am quite confident in my physical abilities. Yes, I believe this is the guild for me! I'll go and join at once!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I see, a place where I can learn a trade... Indeed, we can't always rely on fighting to make a living, and having the ability to gather or craft would be invaluable.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: If I recall correctly, Ul'dah is home to the Alchemists' Guild. I happen to have some familiarity with medicinal herbs, and I daresay I can put the knowledge to use. Yes, I believe this is the guild for me! I'll go and join at once!

dialogue.name: Q7
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: Will you be all right by yourself?

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: I can show you to the guild if you like.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Thanks for your concern, but I should be fine.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: If you still have time, though, could we meet again afterwards? There are a few more things I'd like to ask you about.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Great! I'll look for you here when I'm done!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You wait a good while, but there is no sign of Nhagi. Perhaps you should look in on him at the Pugilists' Guild.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You wait a good while, but Nhagi is nowhere to be seen. Perhaps you should look in on him at the Alchemists' Guild.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Judgin' by how at ease the lad looks around you, I reckon you've got a knack for guidance. Mayhap you'd care to do my job for me? Hehehe...

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: That was a most impressive display, young one! Watching you, I'm reminded of myself in my youth─swift, strong, and handsome. Not to say that I'm not these things anymore, of course...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: You're too kind, Master Hamon! And I'm sure you're still all those things and more!

dialogue.name: CHUCHUTO
dialogue.text: Now, now, Nhagi, take care you don't flatter the old man overmuch. His neck couldn't bear his head getting any larger.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Oh, Forename! I'm glad to say that pugilism agrees with me. My thanks for your recommendation!

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Well now, Forename, to think that you're the one who sent Nhagi to us! The lad possesses rare talent, and I look forward to watching him grow in our art.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: So you're the one who sent Nhagi to us! The lad possesses rare talent, and I look forward to watching him grow in our art.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Right then, my boy. Remember today's lesson well, and keep at your training. Next time, we shall try something a little harder!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I'm sorry for keeping you waiting. So engrossed was I in the combinations, I lost track of time...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Oh, I should mention something. As I was training, a peculiar minstrel approached me. He said that, if I'm resolved to walk an adventurer's path, I should seek him out for a task.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Moreover, he asked that you accompany me. If you're willing, he's apparently waiting at the Ruby Road Exchange.

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Always a pleasure to see you, Forename. Come and shed some sweat with us again soon, do you hear?

dialogue.name: HAMON
dialogue.text: Hm? If you want to shed some sweat too, then you're more than welcome.

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Idiot! Had my mental faculties been diminished as a result, what then!? The world would have forever been deprived of my genius, that's what!

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Ah, my loyal assistant, you are come at a good time! This fool of a trainee switched my drinking water with some unknown fluid...which I unwittingly imbibed!

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Who are you supposed to be? This trainee's keeper? Well then, you should know that the fool switched my drinking water with some unknown fluid...which I unwittingly imbibed!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I-I'm sorry, Master Severian, but it was just a herbal tea. Y-You looked weary, and I thought that it might help...

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Why in the seven hells didn't you say so first!? That way I might have recorded my vital signs and ascertained the tea's effects!

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Such negligence ill befits an alchemist, and I ought to kick you out of my laboratory right now!

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Still...you completed the assigned tasks perfectly. In light of this, you have earned another chance. Very well, you may serve as my assistant─on a probationary basis.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: ...Ahem. I'm sorry you had to see that, Forename. But it seems all is well...at least for now.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Master Severian truly lives and breathes alchemy. Though the tea is quite bitter, he thought only of its effects and made no comment on its taste. I believe I stand to learn much under him, and I'll do my best not to incur his ire.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I must also apologize to you for keeping you waiting. So engrossed was I in the potion making, I lost track of time...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Oh, and one other thing. As I was at my work, a peculiar minstrel approached me. He said that, if I'm resolved to walk an adventurer's path, I should seek him out for a task.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Moreover, he asked that you accompany me. If you're willing, he's apparently waiting at the Ruby Road Exchange.

dialogue.name: SEVERIAN
dialogue.text: Hm, my body feels marginally warmer... It would seem the tea has the effect of promoting circulation...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Here he is, Forename─the minstrel.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: My friend, you have done a splendid job as a guide. I was right to entrust the task to you.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: What? Do you mean to say Forename approached me at your behest?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: SheHe did, I must confess. You see, for my next composition, I seek to capture the essence of the times. While any number of subjects would be worthwhile, of greatest interest to me is the recent rise in the ranks of adventurers.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: In thus bringing different generations of adventurers together, I had hoped for inspiration to strike...and I'm pleased to say that it has!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Drawing upon your experience walking your path, you have helped Nhagi to begin walking his─a reminder that the present owes its existence to the past.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: That is to say, the present and the past are deeply entwined. If we would capture the former, we cannot well disregard the latter. And this brings me to my next request...

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: I ask that you each find an object with a connection to the Calamity─the event which gave rise to the realm's rebirth─and present it to me with its tale.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Well now, that sounds not unlike a treasure hunt...and it'd be my very first task as an adventurer! What do you say, Forename? Shall we do it?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Excellent. When you have your items, pray seek me out at the Ruby Road Exchange. I eagerly look forward to seeing what you bring.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: There are many vendors at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, right? Chances are they'll have something, so let's begin our search there!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Come on, let's begin looking around!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Nhagi'a Jakkya is now accompanying you. Keep him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave Nhagi'a Jakkya behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with him and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have Nhagi'a Jakkya accompany you again, return and speak with him at the original location.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: While you are accompanied, you may encounter “conversation points” along the way which offer additional topics of discussion.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Enter the glowing area and speak with your quest companions to initiate these bonus conversations. Enjoy exploring your surroundings together!

dialogue.name: Q50
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A50
dialogue.text: Talk.

dialogue.name: A50
dialogue.text: Part ways.

dialogue.name: A50
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: An object with a connection to the Calamity... I wonder what manner of things we'll find!

dialogue.name: Q52
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with Nhagi'a Jakkya?

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Oh, you need to be somewhere? All right, I'll wait for you in the area.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Ready to continue? Then let's go!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Nhagi'a Jakkya has yet to arrive. Be sure he is at your side before attempting to continue.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You must be accompanied by Nhagi'a Jakkya and have him at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: A50
dialogue.text: Discuss the local cuisine.

dialogue.name: A50
dialogue.text: Discuss the House of Splendors.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Shall we look around some more? There's bound to be other things out there.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: So far, so good. Let's look around just a little more.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: ...I daresay we've seen enough. Let's find a quiet spot to discuss what to bring back.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have seen enough objects and learned the stories behind them. Make your way to the end of the Sapphire Avenue Exchange with Nhagi'a and speak with him.

dialogue.name: LOLONU
dialogue.text: Welcome, welcome! What is it that you're after?

dialogue.name: LOLONU
dialogue.text: Objects with a connection to the Calamity, you say? Why, I have just the thing─an amethyst ring from Ishgard, steeped in sentimental value!

dialogue.name: LOLONU
dialogue.text: Five years ago, on the eve of the Battle of Carteneau, a young Temple Knight set out from his homeland, wishing to do his part for Eorzea when his nation would not.

dialogue.name: LOLONU
dialogue.text: Alas, the man never arrived in the Flats.

dialogue.name: LOLONU
dialogue.text: En route, he came upon a merchant being attacked by a dragon...and lost his life going to the stranger's aid. This was his ring─an heirloom passed down through his line.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: What a tragic tale... But I wonder─how did the ring find its way back? If the knight fell, it seems the merchant couldn't have survived unscathed...

dialogue.name: LOLONU
dialogue.text: Um...er... A-Ah, I remember now! Though the knight was mortally wounded, he succeeded in striking down the dragon. And with his last breath, he entrusted the ring to the merchant. Y-Yes, that's how it happened!

dialogue.name: LOLONU
dialogue.text: So, what do you say? If you're interested, I would be willing to part with the relic for a special price─but for today only!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Hmmm, this feels a bit dubious...

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: Greetings and welcome to my exhibit. Please feel free to browse at your leisure.

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: Oh, if it isn't Forename! How have you been, my friend?

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: I'm still working at my craft, as you can see. And for the Rising this year, Astin has organized this street exhibit for me. Please feel free to browse at your leisure, and don't hesitate to let me know if you have any questions.

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: Greetings and welcome to my exhibit. Please feel free to browse at your leisure, and don't hesitate to let me know if you have any questions.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: We're looking for objects that bear a connection to the Calamity. Do you have anything that fits the description?

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: As a matter of fact, I do! Yonder pane, entitled The Sultana's Seven, depicts an inspiring event from the Calamity!

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: 'Twas the final days before the fall of Dalamud, its inexorable approach foretelling our impending doom. Panic spread like wildfire, while many in their desperation turned on the sultanate. Looting and rioting broke out across Ul'dah.

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: To quell the masses, Her Royal Majesty Nanamo Ul Namo took to the streets with a guard consisting of only seven subjects, for they alone had the courage to stand with their sultana. There, she addressed the rabble.

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: "Heed me, my beloved citizens! The realm lies upon the brink of the Seventh Umbral Era. Yet so long as we live, we must not forget our compassion. Now is not the time to take from your neighbor, but to proffer him the hand of succor.“

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: Brought to their senses by her words, the people laid down their arms and set about healing the wounds they themselves had inflicted on Ul'dah. And those who returned from the battlefield found their home much as they had left it: a gleaming jewel in the desert.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Her Grace sounds like a great ruler.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Ul'dah is fortunate to have her watching over it.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Thanks for sharing the tale. It's indeed inspiring, and you've done an incredible job capturing it in glass!

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: Having an exhibit all to myself, I can't help but feel a bit self-conscious.

dialogue.name: ANV07GOLDSMITH
dialogue.text: But at the same time, I feel great satisfaction. And it encourages me to keep at my craft.

dialogue.name: NANABE
dialogue.text: Greetings! From daily necessities to unusual curios, I deal in all manner of wares. If there is something in particular you seek, you need but ask.

dialogue.name: NANABE
dialogue.text: Hmmm, objects to do with the Calamity... The two of you are adventurers, are you not? In which case, I have something that may be of interest.

dialogue.name: NANABE
dialogue.text: It's a journal I acquired from an adventurer who retired injured. The man recorded his experiences during the Calamity in detail, and I daresay it has value for students of history.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Oho, an adventurer's firsthand account! I'd love to pore over it!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Do you keep a journal of your adventures as well, Forename? If so, I'd love to read it too one day. With your permission, of course...

dialogue.name: NANABE
dialogue.text: Oh, for another historical piece, I also have a scrapbook of articles from The Raven, Gridania's leading tabloid. These mainly cover events outside the Calamity, however...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Articles from The Raven, you say? Hmmm...

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Ooh, is this the local cuisine? Goodness, but everything looks amazing!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: In the course of your journeys, you must have sampled all kinds of food. From simple fare to exotic feasts, I look forward to sampling everything too!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: House of Splendors? What kind of place is this, I wonder...

dialogue.name: ANV09MOB1
dialogue.text: I see you're not familiar with the House. We offer wares in exchange for scrips, but our services are available only to those whom we know and trust.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: So if I want to be a customer, I need to make a name for myself... One day, Nhagi! One day!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Right, this looks like as good a spot as any.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: I don't know about you, but that was all very new and exciting for me!

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Talking to myriad people, learning the tale behind each object... It's been a great experience, and I won't soon forget it.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Now then, we need to decide what we want to take to the minstrel. Have you made up your mind?

dialogue.name: Q51
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A51
dialogue.text: The Ishgardian knight's ring.

dialogue.name: A51
dialogue.text: The Sultana's Seven pane.

dialogue.name: A51
dialogue.text: The retired adventurer's journal.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text:
I see, I see. I did consider that too, but in the end settled on something else.
...What is it? Hehe, if you don't mind, I'd like to keep it a surprise.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Come, let's purchase our respective items, and meet back where the minstrel awaits!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain the Ishgardian knight's ring.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain The Sultana's Seven pane.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You obtain the retired adventurer's journal.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Hehe, you'll find out what I chose soon enough!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Welcome back. You've each found an item, I trust?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Well now, what have we here...?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: A knight who set out to fight for the realm and gave his life for a stranger... Be it fact or fiction, 'tis a moving tale of valor and sacrifice.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: It reminds us that, though many events may be beneath history's remembrance, they may have altered the lives of those who lived them.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Ah yes, The Sultana's Seven, I know it well. 'Tis an iconic tale of leadership amidst great adversity.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: It may be said that Her Grace's actions that fateful day helped to forge Ul'dah as it is now. In that sense, it well suits the theme for my composition.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: The journal of an adventurer, you say... Despite the vendor's claims, such records typically do not have much historical value, on account of their limited perspective and inherent partiality.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Yet by the same token, they have great value to me, for they offer a glimpse into the writer's heart. There is no richer material for penning verses.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Now then, what of you, young Nhagi?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: And what might this be?

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: It's a scrapbook of articles from The Raven.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: You see, my sister is a reporter for the tabloid. During the Calamity, she traveled the realm, interviewing adventurers about their journeys. And I loved nothing more than to hear her tales.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: They seemed like such a diverse crowd, adventurers. No two people were alike. And yet they were united in the free, unshackled lives they lived. It struck a chord with me, and in time I found myself admiring them.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Looking back, it was my sister who instilled in me the desire to see the world─to become an adventurer. That's why I chose this scrapbook.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: I see... The footprints someone leaves on their journey become the starting point for another...

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Yes, a verse comes to me─a blessing for those souls who are taking their first chary steps into the unknown. Pray, lend me your ears...

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: (-???-)Greetings, Warrior of Light.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: (-???-)This is a world that exists outside your reality. Could it be a dream? A flight of fancy conjured by your weary mind? Perhaps...or perhaps not.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: 'Tis a pleasure to make your acquaintance. My name is Naoki Yoshida, and I have beckoned you here that I might express my gratitude.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: 'Tis a pleasure to meet you again. As I have in the past, I have beckoned you here that I might express my gratitude.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: First of all, I wish to thank you for continuing to grace us with your presence. You and your fellow adventurers are our inspiration, and this shall never change.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: The world, however, is an ever-changing place, mysterious in its elusiveness.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: Unexpected hardships may turn our lives upside down. And though we all desire peace deep in our hearts, the sparks of conflict never cease to be struck.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: Like an adventurer's journey, the world is constantly moving towards the unknown, and it takes considerable courage to alter course.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: Yet I ardently believe that it is a small-but-significant step in our quest to create new adventures.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: Indeed, another great change is about to visit the world, and it shall open the way to exciting new journeys.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: And 'tis our abiding hope that our journey together shall ever continue on, to the distant horizon and beyond.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: ...Now, the time has come for this vision to end; time for your eyes to open from this waking dream.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: Return to walking your path, and know that you are in our hearts always.

dialogue.name: YOSHIDANAOKI
dialogue.text: Till next we meet, I bid you safe travels.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Thank you for the generous reward─and the uplifting verse. It gives me courage for the road ahead.

dialogue.name: NHAGIAJAKKYA
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, it's time I set out on my own. Though it was brief, I enjoyed our time together, and I hope to see you again, somewhere out there!

dialogue.name: Q99
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A99
dialogue.text: Come what may, never forget to smile.

dialogue.name: A99
dialogue.text: Pass my regards to your sister.

dialogue.name: A99
dialogue.text: I look forward to hearing your tales.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Though much and more was lost in the Calamity, intrepid souls continue to set forth, paving the way unto the future. In such a moment in history do we stand, and for you I would perform another song.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
Your life is a riddle, to bear gladness and grief,
'Neath stars and through storms, the answers to seek.♪
Your footprints are threads, to be gathered and woven,
A song of dawn resplendent, dancing high to the heavens.♪

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
From the embrace of the gods though mankind has been torn,
Upon winds eternal lives and memories are borne.♪

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text:
The future is unwritten, bring it rapture or sorrow,
Our journey shall continue, unto tomorrow and tomorrow.♪

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: I wonder─how did you feel as you watched Nhagi set off? Did the sight fill you with worry for a fledgling adventurer? Or did it awaken fond memories of your own humble beginnings?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: Whichever it may be, I know that yours is a journey more trying than most. There will be times when you are overcome by loneliness, and each step feels heavier than the last. In such a moment, I bid you remember this:

dialogue.name: WANDERINGMINSTREL
dialogue.text: So long as you harbor love for this world, ever shall there be a place for you in it. Your adventures will never end.
